attributes.action: Postpone family gatherings for Christmas to Saturday, 27th March 2021.
attributes.additional_details: The most vulnerable will have been vaccinated against Covid by the end of March. Therefore, postponing Christmas gatherings to then will result in a far lower infection rate and death toll. This will especially help the elderly and most vulnerable.
attributes.background: Encourage the public to save lives by postponing large gatherings with family and friends until Saturday, 27th March 2021.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553660
